channel.title: howto on math2001's blog
channel.description: Recent content in howto on math2001's blog

item.title: How to combine svgs
item.description: If you want your website to be fast, you should limit the number of http requests. A great way of doing that is combining your images. If you use SVGS for your icons and stuff like that, here's how you can combine all your icon in one big file, and use them in your website!

item.title: Deploying a hugo site on GitHub pages
item.description: When you want to deploy a static website built with the fantastic Hugo on GitHub pages, you don't have 100 of possibilities. A clean one, and an easy one ðŸ˜„.
